✓ 12.04.2009 – present - telecommunications engineer at LLC ANTRON.

Responsibilities: installation, configuration and linking of CTC (centralized traffic control system) of Ukraine Railway (State Administration of Railway Transport of Ukraine); synchronization of the server group for the automation and management of railway transport, preparation of workstation controllers.
✓ 20.07.2008 — 09.01.2009 - administrator of operational user support (helpdesk) at Company “Homecredit Bank”.
The reduction of the department necessitated my retrenchment;

Winding up of an enterprise necessitated my retrenchment.
